ygData.subject: Re: Bard Hate...
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree I tend to believe bard hate is a myth. Grouping and causing agrovation of course but that goes with any class. If your healing 13 or so points per tic
ygData.messageBody:
I agree I tend to believe bard hate is a myth. Grouping and causing
agrovation of course but that goes with any class. If your healing 13 or so
points per tic for 6 people and you are on the opposite team as me I would
be pissed to :). That pretty much goes the same for buffs.. Your playing
Anthem or something adding so much str and attack speed to every person
thats beating on me.. same thing I would go after you first.

On a side note I saw some verry nasty incident of mob agrovation.

I was in Cazic the other night with my mid to upper 20s group and we are
pulling this lizard and that lizard. All the way across the courtyard was
an old level 50 cleric friend of mine. We are NOT grouped with him not
having ANYTHING to do what the 50th cleric was doing. AND we are pulling
our pulls to the opposite side of the courtyard. These mobs are INSANELY
green to a 50th cleric considering most are blue to me at 26th. Anyways,
during the course of our battle I would see the 50th cleric heal one of his
group way across the yard, having nothing to do with our group. Our mob
would make a B line for the cleric and we would be off chasing our pull.
This happened several times. I asked the cleric if perchance he was casting
on our mob or healing us or anything. Nope.. the mob just hated a 50th
cleric helping anyone I guess.

As far as bard agrovation, its not to bad for me even when I am the pulling.
If I start taking damage ill have a caster root and let some one tank. I
wield a staff of writhing and a silvery 1h. (sometimes pgt or my duel
daggers for skill)


Tuldar newly 27th bard( and playing with sirens pulling EVERY green lizard
in cazic train)
